me jayagrahanayen pasu apata balaporoththuwak thibenawa, enam mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuman rate bahuthara janathawa ethuma gana thibu wishwasaya raka ;gana methek, sarthaka lesa pawathwagena aa ayurin rate sanwardhana kriyawaliya akhandawa idiriyata genayawi kiyala.prawina madhyawedi mohan samaranayakadashaka kihipayak pura pawathi thrasthawadaya nima kirima wenuwen janathawa janadhipathithumata dakwu kruthawedithwaya mewara mathiwarana jayagrahanayen pilibimbau wenawa. 2005 mathiwaranayata janadhipathithuma idiripath wana wita ethumata thibune athitha deshapalana charyawak pamanayi.2009 di 50.29ka chanda prathishathayak labu ethuma mewara eya 58%k dakwa ihala nanwagena pera nowu wiru jayak labuwe yuddhaya nima kirima wenuwen janathawagen labunu kruthawedithwaya nisayi.
